title: Moving out of home.
body:
for people who have moved out of their parent/guardians homes:

* 1 thing you miss the most
* 1 thing that happens you cant explain why but it never happened with living with parents
* worst thing about moving out
* best thing about moving out


My own:

* 1 thing you miss the most
Cooked vegetables and meat. Been eating a ton of pasta lately and just simple cheap stuff.

* 1 thing that happens you cant explain why but it never happened with living with parents
after doing washing ALWAYS have odd socks.

* worst thing about moving out
stress about money and always having to think of what to eat and cooking for myself ):
* best thing about moving out
can fap 24/7

replies.body:
1.  1 thing you miss the most
*Free time, I hate that i get home cook and by the time i have eaten and cleaned up it's to late to do any thing.*
____
2.  1 thing that happens you cant explain why but it never happened with living with parents
 *Batteries in various remotes, i thought they lasted a life time.
Also food you swear you had not been there.
Lights still turned on in the morning.*
____
3.  worst thing about moving out
*Honestly its not having that feeling of home, I have yet to have a house feel the same as living with family.*
____
4.  best thing about moving out
*Freedom and independence. *
____

**1 thing you miss the most**
Cheese (omg so expensive)


**1 thing that happens you cant explain why but it never happened with living with parents**
Constant appliance breakdowns :/

**worst thing about moving out**
Having to decide between fresh meat, fruit, vegetables or a relatively quick and stable internet connection. 
Also, living in a flat of nocturnal gamers that decide to play fighting games really freaking loud at ridiculous hours of the morning. 

**best thing about moving out**
No longer being forced into babysitting

1 thing you miss the most
Food cooked for me. D:

1 thing that happens you cant explain why but it never happened with living with parents
I feel more inclined to clean, unlike when I was at home.

worst thing about moving out
Sometimes I miss waking up and sitting in the lounge and having acoffee with my mum.

best thing about moving out
Can walk around naked.

Hello Officer,

My answer;
- Cooking, and food in the pantry. Grocery shopping is tedious and frequent! Also eating diversity does seem to decrease doesn't it :P.
- My room always gets cluttered, how does it build up so frequently! I'm constantly cleaning (I'm looking at you Adam!)
- All the extra responsibilities eating into my LOL time, cleaning, laundries, bills & errands, cooking
- Friends can come over without permission or needing to be quite :D 

Skyprus :D

1 thing you miss the most

Free internet

1 thing that happens you cant explain why but it never happened with living with parents

I don't have a tv. 

worst thing about moving out

Need your own internet. 

best thing about moving out

I don't have to hide my collection of knives from my parents.
